[[Image:Tyria Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Tyria on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Tyria''' is a former city of the [[Valyria|Valyrian Freehold]]. It was laid waste in the Doom of Valyria. Its ruins are now located on the same island as the ruins of Valyria itself, across the [[Smoking Sea]] from [[Oros]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/valyria/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Valyria entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Tyria is connected by a Valyrian road to the ruins of the capital city of Valyria.
